name: Demons Against Us
description:
Demons Against Us is a top-down multiplayer game made for Multiplayer Game Jam. The game story is based on two friends who have to collect 4 books for defeating the demons. For collecting the 4 books they have to pass 4 challenges. Players have to survive and have to save each other for overcoming challenges. 

How to Play:

By killing a specific amount of demons (which will be shown on each challenge), players will pass the challenges and will collect the books. Take down enemies with a stave(weapon). For increasing health collect hearts. Increase your team scores and get to the top of the room's leaderboard.

Controls:

1. Move your mouse to rotate the stave (weapon)

2. WASD or Arrow Keys = Move

3. Space bar = Dash Move

Rules:

1. Maximum 2 players can join a room.

2. Each room has to be at least 2 players for starting the actual game.

3. Create or join a room by simply typing the name of the room
